sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_appn"> <x_snc_nnemc0_appn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <appn_code>NWCF</appn_code> <appn_desc>The Navy Working Capital Fund (NWCF) is a branch of the family of Department of Defense (DoD) Working Capital Funds. The NWCF is a revolving fund, an account or fund that relies on sales revenue rather than direct Congressional appropriations to finance its operations. It is intended to generate adequate revenue to cover the full costs of its operations, and to finance the fund's continuing operations without fiscal year limitations. A revolving fund is intended to operate on a break-even basis over time; that is, it neither makes a profit nor incurs a loss. </appn_desc> <appn_type>Navy Working Capital Fund</appn_type> <number>APPN0001007</number> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_appn</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 15:05:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>60eea75adb1d23008e9357935e961948</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 15:05:06</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_appn> </record_update>
